[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.CrossChain/CrossChainContract_Helper.cs] [Function: AssertValidSideChainCreationRequest()] [Allowance Race] Can an attacker front-run the allowance check by calling approve(0) right before AssertValidSideChainCreationRequest executes, bypassing the validation? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.CrossChain/CrossChainContract_Helper.cs] [Function: AssertValidSideChainCreationRequest()] [IsPrivilegePreserved Bypass] If IsPrivilegePreserved=false at line 124, resource and token validations are skipped.
